topic.title: plenty of errors
topic.body:
ERROR Site:1CiXRY..QoF2 Site sign failed: data/users/1AyoVRTzmLdBab5UodAe5Gkf1vUc4acSfK/content.json: VerifyError: Include optional files too large 2504836458B > 1000000000B in UiWebsocket.py line 447 > ContentManager.py line 771 > 887 > 908


huh?

1594773031_1AyoVRTzmLdBab5UodAe5Gkf1vUc4.body:
> [bats](#comment_11_1QvU5RXqw5mjgR3BZV5rkc2ju6NHXpGnp): That error message seems to say: "The optional file that has a size of about 2.5 GB cannot be published because it's too large. Only files up to 1 GB can be included." Does that relate to your problem at all?

no because no file even goes up to 1 gb

> [bats](#comment_13_1QvU5RXqw5mjgR3BZV5rkc2ju6NHXpGnp): I got nothing then.

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1ByBn2itvhVrb7qie4uYrLmpydMEi1cmfh/ make a test if u got time
